ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have my Hand-to-hand at 68 right now, and I have found an interesting thing.  When I slow medium or easy blues, I can kill em faster and take less damage
ygData.messageBody:
>Sorry, can't help. I foresaw this possibility when I started,
>and kept all my combat skills maxed as I went. I've been
>neglecting throwing and hand-to-hand lately though. Hope they
>aren't useful later... :-)
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
I have my Hand-to-hand at 68 right now, and I have found an interesting
thing. When I slow medium or easy blues, I can kill em faster and take less
damage by twisting Denon's Discord (with Horn) and Melodic Binding with a
bellow thrown in every once and a while. Just have to stay in 3rd person
view to look out for wanderers. I just made 22nd this afternoon and used
this alot on Aviaks in S Karana to do it :)

Rokenn Swiftsong
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Karana Server
